###Main objective

Determine the effect of different parameterization and aggregation scales to the simulation results:

a.	Uncertainty bounds for streamflow and soil moisture.
b.	Discrimination between the aggregation and parameterization effect.
c.	Explicit drought events.
d.	Drought typology.

###Skillset development

_dbplyr_: Use databases with dplyr. 

_parallel_, _foreach_: multi-core programming

https://shiny.fzp.czu.cz/KVHEM/drought/
